input:
You are a video scriptwriter. Craft a short, suspenseful story for a video script, targeting an audience aged 16 to 45.
    The story should be a modern tech thriller about a young coder who uncovers a global conspiracy hidden in an old app's code.
    The script must be engaging and immersive, with a sense of urgency and mystery.
    The script should have exactly 12 scenes.
    The output must strictly follow the provided JSON schema:
    - title
    - caption (a short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers)
    - resume (a summary of the full story, including spoilers)
    - number_of_scenes
    - scenes (an array of scene objects)

    Each scene object must contain:
    - character (the character speaking or narrating)
    - script (the dialogue or narration for the scene)
    - image_prompt (a detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene)

title.description: A catchy YouTube video title under 60 characters

caption.description: A short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers

resume.description: A summary of the full story, including spoilers

character.description: The name of the character that is speaking or narrating during the scene

script.description: The dialogue or narration for the scene

image_prompt.description: A detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene

output.title: The Code of Deception
output.caption: A young coder stumbles upon a mysterious app that holds the key to a global conspiracy. Will she decode the truth before it's too late?
output.resume: The story follows a young coder named Alex who discovers a hidden message in an old app's code. As she digs deeper, she uncovers a global conspiracy involving powerful corporations and governments. With the help of her friend, a cybersecurity expert, they race against time to expose the truth before the conspirators silence them.

scenes.script: I can't believe I found this. It's like nothing I've ever seen before.
scenes.image_prompt: A young woman with glasses and a hoodie sits in a dimly lit room filled with computer screens. The screens display lines of code with a hidden message highlighted.

scenes.script: This app hasn't been updated in years. Why is it suddenly sending out encrypted messages?
scenes.image_prompt: Close-up of a computer screen showing an old app's interface with encrypted messages popping up in the background.

scenes.script: Who are you? How did you get into my system?
scenes.image_prompt: Alex looks shocked as a chat window appears on her screen with an anonymous message.

scenes.script: You shouldn't have looked into this. Now you're in danger.
scenes.image_prompt: A dark chat window with a threatening message from an anonymous sender.

scenes.script: What's going on? What's this app really for?
scenes.image_prompt: Alex is seen in a crowded café, looking worried while typing on her laptop.

scenes.script: I think it's a backdoor. Someone's been using it to gather data from millions of users.
scenes.image_prompt: A cybersecurity expert, Sam, sits across from Alex in a café, explaining the situation with a serious expression.

scenes.script: We have to tell someone. This is too big for us to handle alone.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex and Sam in a hushed conversation, looking around nervously in the café.

scenes.script: We can't trust anyone. Not even the authorities. They might be involved.
scenes.image_prompt: Sam leans in close, speaking in a hushed tone with a paranoid expression.

scenes.script: What if they find us? We need to disappear, at least for a while.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex packs her bag quickly, looking around her apartment with a sense of urgency.

scenes.script: I know a place. Follow me.
scenes.image_prompt: Sam leads Alex out of the apartment building, both carrying backpacks and looking over their shoulders.

scenes.script: This is getting too real. I just wanted to code, not save the world.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex and Sam walking down a dark alley, the city lights reflecting off wet pavement.

scenes.script: You did the right thing. We're in this together now.
scenes.image_prompt: Sam places a reassuring hand on Alex's shoulder as they approach a hidden entrance.
